mapper.select: SELECT A.INUM INUM ,A.IID IID ,A.IPHOTO IPHOTO ,A.IUPLOAD IUPLOAD ,A.ICONTENT ICONTENT ,A.DELETEYN DELETEYN ,TO_CHAR(A.IINSERT, 'YYYY-MM-DD') IINSERT ,TO_CHAR(A.IUPDATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') IUPDATE FROM DOG_PARK A WHERE A.DELETEYN='Y' AND A.INUM = #{inum, jdbcType=VARCHAR}

SELECT A.INUM INUM ,A.IID IID ,A.IPHOTO IPHOTO ,A.IUPLOAD IUPLOAD ,A.ICONTENT ICONTENT ,A.DELETEYN DELETEYN ,TO_CHAR(A.IINSERT, 'YYYY-MM-DD') IINSERT ,TO_CHAR(A.IUPDATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') IUPDATE FROM DOG_PARK A WHERE A.DELETEYN = 'Y' ORDER BY A.INUM DESC
mapper.update: UPDATE DOG_PARK SET DELETEYN = 'N', IUPDATE = SYSDATE WHERE DELETEYN = 'Y' AND INUM = #{inum, jdbcType=VARCHAR}
